meanings.sent1: The ghostly figure had an unearthly glow about it.
meanings.sent2: The eerie sound coming from the abandoned house was truly unearthly.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unearthly ability to always find the warmest spot in the house amazed the family.
meanings.sent4: The unearthly beauty of the starlit sky took my breath away.
meanings.sent5: The unearthly silence of the forest at night made me feel like I was in another realm.

meanings.sent1: The unearthly behavior of the strange man made everyone uneasy.
meanings.sent2: The peculiar markings on the ancient artifact were truly unearthly.
meanings.sent3: The unearthly combination of flavors in the new ice cream flavor left me puzzled.
meanings.sent4: Her unearthly talent for solving puzzles astounded her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The unearthly sight of a rainbow at midnight left the town in awe.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is not characteristic of the earth or its inhabitants.
meanings.sent1: The spaceship flew unearthly fast through the galaxy.
meanings.sent2: The alien moved unearthly gracefully, unlike anything seen on Earth.
meanings.sent3: The cake disappeared from the kitchen cupboard unearthly quickly, leaving everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed unearthly loud in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden bloomed unearthly early this year, surprising the gardeners.
